description:
Shachi finally brings Kenshiro to a safe haven. Around that time, Commander of Asura Kain, having received instructions to search for Shachi and Kenshiro, sets about his search in hopes of attaining the coveted position of third general. The cabin where Shachi arrived finally gets searched, but due to poor timing, the only one there is the cabin`s elderly caretaker. Asura henchmen intrude inside... Meanwhile, in order to draw Hyoh to the dark world, Kaioh takes his own younger sister by blood, Sayaka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaioh`s Evil Decision! Cold Blood Runs Through My Body!!
Le choix de Kaioh le démon ! Un froid glacial parcourt tout mon corps !!
カイオウ悪魔の選択! 俺の全身には冷血が脈打つ!!
